aspguidp.controller.output.element

Class OutputElementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • aspguidp.controller.output.element.OutputElementController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntityOutputController, ValueOutputController

    public abstract class OutputElementController
extends java.lang.Object
    Base controller class for an output component. This class implements basic functionality which is used by all output components of the application.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeConditionStatementHandler

        protected void initializeConditionStatementHandler(java.lang.String conditionAtom,
                                                   javafx.scene.Node rootNode)
        Initialize a handler which sets the visibility of the given root node based on if the given condition atom is contained in the current displayed answer set. This method is used by the output components of the application, to hide/show the output component based on the display condition of the output component.

        This method creates a new condition service with the given atom and binds the visibility of the root node to the respective property of the condition service. Also, the method sets up a handler which updates the application window size on visibility change.

        Parameters:
        conditionAtom - string representation of an atom
        rootNode - javafx node which is hidden if the given atom is not contained in the currently displayed answer set
